name: timestamp
description: The timestamp when the server relay pings occurred

name: buyer_id
description: The buyer the server belongs to

name: datacenter_id
description: The datacenter the server is in

name: server_relay_id
description: Relay id being pinged by the server

name: server_relay_rtt
description: Round trip time ping between the server and the relay (milliseconds)

name: server_relay_jitter
description: Jitter between the server and the relay (milliseconds)

name: server_relay_packet_loss
description: Packet loss between the server and the relay (%)
